patterns: am i able to do changes in my profile?
can i change my profile information?
where can i change my information?
i want to change my profile
i want to change my profile information
i want to modify my profile
responses: Go to settings from the navigation bar below, then edit your profile information and save
Go to the settings from the navigation bar then do the changes you like and hit save
Go to settings from the menu below, change information and save

patterns: what types of payment methods are available?
can i pay through the app
can i pay with credit card?
responses: For now there are no payment methods through the app
As of now there are no payment methods avaliable, in the near future we will add some options

patterns: how do i search for products?
responses: You can search for products from the search bar at the top of the home tab
You can find the search bar at the home tab
Use the search bar at the top of the home tab to find the products you want

patterns: i want to buy a book
responses: You can search for the product you want from the search bar in the home tab, then select the product and hit buy, this app only faciltate the process and show the items avaiable for sale, you can't purchase directly through it at the moment

patterns: can i add products for sale?
i want to sell my stuff
i want to sell my products
where can i sell my products?
from where i can add my products for sale?
how can i add my products for sale?
i wanna add my items for sale
responses: Yes, you can add new products for sale from the plus icon in the lower side of your screen, then add the product information
If you would like to put your products for sale, you can use the plus icon on the lower side of your screen, then add your product information

patterns: what kind of products are avaiable in the app?
are there any limitations for adding items?
are there any restrictions or limitations?
responses: This application only accept the products that are related to the university, such as books other learning materials
The product must be a learning material or a tool that is used for studying
